scripts.export-server: rm -rf functions/.nuxt && mkdir -p functions/.nuxt/dist && cp -r .nuxt/dist/server functions/.nuxt/dist
scripts.export-public: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public/_nuxt && cp -r .nuxt/dist/client/. public/_nuxt && cp -r static/. public
scripts.deploy: yarn export-server && yarn export-public && yarn deploy-fire
